SELECT *
FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM (SELECT P_NO , P_NAME , P_PRICE , P_DISCOUNT , P_DETAIL , P_THUMBNAIL FROM PRODUCT
ORDER BY P_NO DESC) A )
WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.*
FROM ( SELECT P_NO , P_NAME , P_PRICE , P_DISCOUNT , P_DETAIL , P_THUMBNAIL FROM PRODUCT LEFT JOIN P_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) WHERE CATEGORY_1 = '베스트' ORDER BY P_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.*
FROM ( SELECT P_NO , P_NAME , P_PRICE , P_DISCOUNT , P_DETAIL , P_THUMBNAIL FROM PRODUCT
LEFT JOIN P_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) WHERE CATEGORY_1 = '신상품' ORDER BY P_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT P_NO , P_NAME , P_PRICE , P_DISCOUNT , P_DETAIL , P_THUMBNAIL
FROM PRODUCT LEFT JOIN P_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) WHERE
E_NO = ?
ORDER BY P_NO DESC
SELECT P_NO , P_NAME , P_PRICE , P_DISCOUNT , P_THUMBNAIL , P_IMAGE1 , P_IMAGE2 , P_UNIT , P_WEIGHT , P_DELI , P_NATION , P_PACKTYPE , P_DETAIL FROM PRODUCT WHERE P_NO = ?
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT P_NO , P_NAME , P_INVENTORY , P_COMPANY FROM PRODUCT P ORDER BY P_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT review_board_no , review_rate , review_title , m.mem_id , r.reg_date , like_count , click_no
FROM REVIEW r JOIN MEMBERS m ON(r.MEM_NO = m.MEM_NO) WHERE r.P_NO = ?

SELECT R.review_board_no , review_rate , review_title , M.mem_id , R.reg_date , like_count , click_no
FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBERS M ON(R.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) JOIN RV_ATTACH A ON(R.REVIEW_BOARD_NO = a.review_board_no) WHERE R.P_NO = ? AND A.RV_ATTACH_IMG != 'N'

SELECT review_board_no , review_rate , review_title , m.mem_id , r.reg_date , like_count , click_no
FROM REVIEW r JOIN MEMBERS m ON(r.MEM_NO = m.MEM_NO) WHERE r.P_NO = ? ORDER BY ? DESC

SELECT P_NO , CATEGORY_1 || '/' || CATEGORY_2 || '/' || CATEGORY_3 AS "CATEGORY_NAME" , E_TITLE , P_NAME , P_PRICE , P_DISCOUNT , P_IMAGE1 , P_IMAGE2 , P_INVENTORY , P_COMPANY , P_UNIT , P_WEIGHT , P_DETAIL , DIS_YN , E_YN , P_SMALLDETAIL , P_DELI , P_NATION , P_PACKTYPE , P_THUMBNAIL , P_OUT FROM PRODUCT JOIN P_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN EVENT USING(E_NO) WHERE P_NO = ?
